instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook pro 2016 wont reset smc
threads.message: I have a problem with macbook pro 2016, I tried smc reset but it wont turn on after i press the power button, I replace with new motherboard and problem is the same. The backlight on the keyboard is not working also, what could be a problem what should i change in order to work normally

threads.title: Macbook pro 2016 wont reset smc
threads.message: More detail, I have battery problem, so i changed the battery and it looks it was working normal but after i first restart it shows not charging and 1% battery, like I said keyboard backlight didnt worked even i bought new keyboard with bottom plate. I tried smc reset but i just cant tun on machine after pressing shift,control,option and power button. So i bought new motherboard since i tought its motherboard issue but after attaching new motherboard problems didnt go away, its still the same. I can boot to system, fan is spinning but it seems the macbook is very slow. What could be a problem and how to solve it?

threads.title: Macbook pro 2016 wont reset smc
threads.message:
Possibly ALS issue, that explains unworking KB backlight and slow system.
Disconnect webcam connector from botom case.
You can also test if system works smoothly disconnecting internal LCD, using external monitor.

threads.title: Macbook pro 2016 wont reset smc
threads.message: Why i cant make smc reset? After instaling new motherboard why new battery shows not charging and 1%? I cant find connection with webcam connector and smc reset and battery issue

threads.title: Macbook pro 2016 wont reset smc
threads.message: Even if I disconnect battery i cant do smc reset. If I cover the ambient sensor with finger i can increase or decrease light but there is no light on the keyboard at all it will only decrease light on screen

threads.title: Macbook pro 2016 wont reset smc
threads.message:
Is that new chinese battery?
I strongly recommend to test with known good battery, even old.

Test all the KB, be sure specific keys for SMC reset work properly.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://www.keyboardtester.com/[/URL]
[URL unfurl="true"]https://keyboardchecker.com/[/URL]

threads.title: Macbook pro 2016 wont reset smc
threads.message: I bought battery at ifixit store, if that is chinese then i dont know where to buy original

threads.title: Macbook pro 2016 wont reset smc
threads.message:
Wait, you said machine doesn't turn on after doing SMC reset?
So SMC reset keys combination does something.
